edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.controller
Interface MapListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MapListenerImpl
public interface MapListener

Classes that implement this interface are used to react to certain events on the map by changing the model accordingly and updating the view if necessary.

Author:
Fabian

Method Summary
 void clickOnPOI(String poiID)
          Is called when the user clicked on POI marker.
 void mapLocatorChanged(MapLocator mapLocator)
          This method is called when the user changed the shown map section.
 void setRouteFromByContextMenu(MapPosition position)
          Is called when the user wants to calculate a route from a given start point.
 void setRouteToByContextMenu(MapPosition position)
          Is called when the user wants to calculate a route to a given end point.
 

Method Detail

mapLocatorChanged

void mapLocatorChanged(MapLocator mapLocator)
This method is called when the user changed the shown map section.

Parameters:
mapLocator - the new mapLocator which determines the new map location the user entered

clickOnPOI

void clickOnPOI(String poiID)
Is called when the user clicked on POI marker.

Parameters:
poiID - specifies the clicked POI

setRouteFromByContextMenu

void setRouteFromByContextMenu(MapPosition position)
Is called when the user wants to calculate a route from a given start point.

Parameters:
position - the MapPosition which marks the start of the route.

setRouteToByContextMenu

void setRouteToByContextMenu(MapPosition position)
Is called when the user wants to calculate a route to a given end point.

Parameters:
position - the MapPosition which marks the end point of the route.
